com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.predictdataclasses

Class PredictDataAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.predictdataclasses.PredictDataAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PredictDataMoneyOwed, PredictDataSavingsAccount

    public class PredictDataAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base account "row" in our list of values used in the prediction algorithm After the prediction algorithm is run this row tells us the value of whatever account it is a part of on the date. It also gives us the transaction history on this date. (Would have to combine all rows to get full history)
